title: CSS Introduction
description: Introduction to CSS styling, selectors, and layout techniques

questions.title: Basic CSS Styling
questions.description: Add basic CSS styling to make text blue and bold

checks.description: HTML should contain a style element or link to CSS
CSS should set a color property
CSS should set font-weight property

questions.title: Class Selector
questions.description: Create a CSS class selector and apply it to an HTML element

checks.description: HTML should contain a class attribute
CSS should contain a class selector (.)
CSS should have a valid class selector with opening brace

questions.title: ID Selector
questions.description: Create a CSS ID selector and apply it to an HTML element

checks.description: HTML should contain an id attribute
CSS should contain an ID selector (#)
CSS should have a valid ID selector with opening brace

questions.title: Horizontal Layout
questions.description: Create a horizontal layout using flexbox or inline-block

anyPass.description: Use inline-block with space for horizontal layout

checks.description: CSS should create horizontal layout using flexbox or inline-block
HTML should contain div elements for layout

questions.title: Floating Element
questions.description: Create a floating element positioned to the right

checks.description: CSS should float an element to the right
CSS should float an element to the right (no space)
HTML should contain div elements

questions.title: Background Color
questions.description: Set a background color for an element

checks.description: CSS should set background-color property
CSS should set background property
CSS should have a valid background color value

questions.title: Margin and Padding
questions.description: Apply margin and padding to elements

checks.description: CSS should set margin property
CSS should set padding property
CSS should have margin or padding with pixel values

questions.title: External CSS File
questions.description: Link to an external CSS file

checks.description: HTML should contain a link element
Link should have href attribute pointing to stylesheet
Link should have rel="stylesheet" attribute
Referenced CSS file should exist

instructions.setup: Create an HTML file with CSS styling. You can use inline styles or external CSS files.
requirements: Link external CSS files when required
tips: Use browser developer tools to test your CSS
